description
=====================
Max Payne : The Anthology is a complete set of products , dealing with the fate of Max Payne , a talented New York Police Department detective . As part of this package includes both the first and second part of the famous series of the Finnish team Remedy Studios.

Max Payne is an action game created in collaboration with 3D Realms . You play the role of the agent , hunted by the secret service after he accused him of killing his own boss. Wishing to avenge his murdered family , our ward is involved in the middle of reckoning criminal world of New York and must face ruthless murderers , drug addicts , bad cops , corrupt politicians and other figures emerging from the darkness of terrifying realism , three-dimensional scenery. Extremely elaborate plot gradually reveals more secrets at a time when Max enters the darkest areas of the criminal underworld , where he must purify himself , from its allegations , and to discover and expose the dark web of betrayal and conspiracy.

Max Payne has been designed with the aim of creating a new quality in the market action games , presented from the perspective of a third person. With a revolutionary system of fighting climate resembles a movie. This exposes the inspiration of authors, drawn directly from the black detective from the 50s , a novel species belonging to pulp fiction and contemporary blockbusters ( The Matrix ) , produced in studios in Hollywood.

Max Payne 2: The Fall of Max Payne is a sequel to a great action game of 2001 , tells of a dramatic struggle cop , Max Payne title , with a criminal organization responsible for the distribution of a new , dangerous drug Valkyr . The action of this part takes place a year after the events in which we participated in the first installment and then takes us to New York. Max returned to the ranks of the police and for a brief period it seemed that everything was back to normal . Unfortunately, his life returned to the past, ie watching for the life of our hero offender and Mona , a mysterious woman with whom Max has located its amorous feelings.

The whole plot was constructed in a manner reminiscent of the construction of crime movies from the 40s of the twentieth century (the Convention " noir " ), where we have one "good" protagonist , a woman ( femme fatale ) and the love story and a detective story full of many surprises and twists . Overall, the scenario Max Payne 2: The Fall Of Max Payne is three times larger than before, but the game itself has a similar length as the first installment . Told the story is deeper and more concise . While the " single room " storylines and the fight were separate parts , ie the player can steer clear of cutscenes and still reach the final all the fun , the " talon " everything has been merged together . Regardless of any changes in concept , we still have to deal with the title only for adults , which does not nullify the terrible scenes of violence , murder , etc.
